item.title: [Python] Let's find the maximum value python (modified ver)
item.description: This is a modified version of "[Look for the maximum value] python"(https://qiita.com/banana19980702/items/08b30cc81602917e8407)" that I posted the other day. Here are the bad points and changes in the previous code: Bad points ・When the list elements are all negative, the maximum value becomes 0. ・Slow processing speed ##change point ・Set the initial value of the maximum value candidate to an appropriate element of the list ・From while sentence to for sentence
